sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../../styles/SellerDashboard/ProductsTab.css'; /** * ProductsTab Component * Manages seller's product listings with add/edit/delete functionality * Props: * - myProducts: array of seller's products * - showAddModal: boolean to show/hide modal * - editingProduct: currently editing product or null * - formData: form data object * - categories: array of category options * - onOpenModal: function to open add/edit modal * - onCloseModal: function to close modal * - onEditProduct: function to start editing a product * - onDeleteProduct: function to delete a product * - onFormChange: function to update form data * - onSubmit: function to submit form (create/update) */ function ProductsTab({ myProducts, showAddModal, editingProduct, formData, categories, onOpenModal, onCloseModal, onEditProduct, onDeleteProduct, onFormChange, onSubmit }) { return (
{/* Header with Add Button */}

My Products ({myProducts.length})

{/* Products Grid */}
{myProducts.map(product => (
{/* Product Image/Icon */}
{product.image}
{/* Product Info */}

{product.name}

{product.category}

{product.description}

{/* Status Badge */}
{product.status === 'approved' && '‚úÖ Approved'} {product.status === 'pending' && '‚è≥ Pending'} {product.status === 'rejected' && '‚ùå Rejected'}
{/* Price & Stock Info */}
Price: ‚Çπ{product.price} {product.discount > 0 && ( -{product.discount}% )}
Stock: {product.stock} units
Sold: {product.sold} units
{product.revenue && (
Revenue: ‚Çπ{(product.revenue / 1000).toFixed(1)}K
)}
{/* Action Buttons */}
))}
{/* Add/Edit Product Modal */} {showAddModal && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

{editingProduct ? 'Edit Product' : 'Add New Product'}

{/* Product Name */}
onFormChange('name', e.target.value)} placeholder="e.g. Wireless Headphones" required />
{/* Category */}
{/* Description */}
